items.title: Awesome Privacy
items.content_text:
### PC / MacOS

*   MS Windows - Owned by Microsoft it is known for collecting many user data and tricking users to own a Microsoft account. If you still want and happen to use Windows 10, you can use [this tool (â­3.7k)](https://github.com/builtbybel/privatezilla), or [this other tool](https://www.w10privacy.de/english-home/) to see and disable the tons of privacy-invasive settings of MS Windows.

items.title: Awesome Rest
items.content_text:
### .NET Clients

*   [RestSharp (â­9.8k)](https://github.com/restsharp/RestSharp) - Simple REST and HTTP API client for .NET
*   [Refit (â­9.1k)](https://github.com/reactiveui/refit) - The automatic type-safe REST library for Xamarin and .NET
*   [Flurl](https://flurl.dev) - Fluent, portable, testable REST/HTTP client library
*   [RestEase (â­1.1k)](https://github.com/canton7/RestEase) - Easy-to-use typesafe REST API client library, which is simple and customisable. Heavily inspired by Refit
*   [Tiny.RestClient (â­209)](https://github.com/jgiacomini/Tiny.RestClient) - Simpliest Fluent REST client for .NET.
*   [RestLess (â­112)](https://github.com/letsar/RestLess) - The automatic type-safe-reflectionless REST API client library for .Net Standard.
*   [Apizr (â­159)](https://github.com/Respawnsive/Apizr) - Refit-based web api client, but resilient (retry, connectivity, cache, auth, log, priority, etc...).
items.content_html:
.NET Clients

  • RestSharp (â­9.8k) - Simple REST and HTTP API client for .NET
  • Refit (â­9.1k) - The automatic type-safe REST library for Xamarin and .NET
  • Flurl - Fluent, portable, testable REST/HTTP client library
  • RestEase (â­1.1k) - Easy-to-use typesafe REST API client library, which is simple and customisable. Heavily inspired by Refit
  • Tiny.RestClient (â­209) - Simpliest Fluent REST client for .NET.
  • RestLess (â­112) - The automatic type-safe-reflectionless REST API client library for .Net Standard.
  • Apizr (â­159) - Refit-based web api client, but resilient (retry, connectivity, cache, auth, log, priority, etc...).

items.title: Awesome Game Engine Dev
items.content_text:
### Game Engines / Popular

*   ğŸ’¸ [Unity](https://unity.com) - Biggest name in game engines, industry standard. \[[Awesome (â­6.9k)](https://github.com/RyanNielson/awesome-unity)]
*   ğŸ’¸ [Unreal Engine](https://www.unrealengine.com) - AAA quality, insane feature set, photoreal visuals. \[[Awesome (â­1.4k)](https://github.com/insthync/awesome-ue4#readme)]

### Game Engines / Commercial

*   ğŸ’¸ [Construct](https://www.construct.net/) - Drag and drop game builder. \[[Awesome (â­83)](https://github.com/ConstructCommunity/awesome-construct#readme)]

### Learning / Computer Graphics

*   Awesome Collections
    *   ğŸ“š [Awesome Demoscene (â­373)](https://github.com/psykon/awesome-demoscene) - Underground computer art culture exploring computer graphics and sound.
    *   ğŸ“š [Awesome Graphics Libraries (â­488)](https://github.com/jslee02/awesome-graphics-libraries#readme) - Curated list of 3D graphics libraries and resources.
*   Books
    *   ğŸ“š [GPU Gems](https://developer.nvidia.com/gpugems/gpugems/contributors) - Programming techniques, tips, and tricks for real-time graphics.
    *   ğŸ“š [GPU Gems 2](https://developer.nvidia.com/gpugems/gpugems2/copyright) - Programming techniques for high-performance graphics.
    *   ğŸ“š [GPU Gems 3](https://developer.nvidia.com/gpugems/gpugems3/contributors) - Collection of state-of-the-art GPU programming examples hosted by *NVIDIA*.
    *   ğŸ“š [Interactive Computer Graphics](https://www.cs.unm.edu/~angel/) - Top down approach to computer graphics.
    *   ğŸ“š [Physically-Based Rendering](https://www.pbrt.org) - From the Academy Award winning authority on PBR.
*   Education Portals
    *   ğŸ“š [Game Art Tricks](http://simonschreibt.de/game-art-tricks/) - Articles exploring different graphics techniques.
    *   ğŸ“š [Lighthouse3d.com](http://www.lighthouse3d.com/tutorials/) - Collection of tutorials on OpenGL, GLSL and other graphics topics.
    *   ğŸ“š [Paper Bug](https://www.jeremyong.com/paperbug/) - Indexed compendium of graphics programming papers.
    *   ğŸ“š [Scratchapixel](https://www.scratchapixel.com) - In depth coverage of computer graphics topics.

### Learning / Graphical User Interface

*   ğŸ“š [List of Widget Toolkits](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_widget_toolkits) - Gui frameworks across all platforms and languages.

### Learning / Programming

*   ğŸ“š [TIOBE Index](https://www.tiobe.com/tiobe-index/) - Popularity of programming languages, updated monthly.

### Libraries / C

*   ğŸ“š [Learn C Programming](https://www.programiz.com/c-programming) - Excellent tutorials that will guide you to learn C programming.
*   C: Graphics - 2D

    *   ğŸ‰ [Tilengine (â­947)](https://github.com/megamarc/Tilengine) - 2D graphics with raster effects for retro style game development.
*   C: Gui
    *   ğŸ‰ [cImgui (â­1.7k)](https://github.com/cimgui/cimgui) - Thin C wrapper generated for Dear ImGui.
    *   ğŸ‰ [lvgl (â­20k)](https://github.com/lvgl/lvgl) ğŸ”¥ - Embedded gui library, many widgets and advanced visual effects.
    *   ğŸ‰ [NAppGUI (â­593)](https://github.com/frang75/nappgui_src) - Professional, well documented SDK to build desktop apps.
    *   ğŸ‰ [Native File Dialog (â­1.9k)](https://github.com/mlabbe/nativefiledialog) - Portably invoke native file open / save dialogs.
    *   ğŸ‰ [Nuklear (â­10k)](https://github.com/Immediate-Mode-UI/Nuklear) - Single-header immediate mode cross-platform gui library.
*   C: Physics
    *   ğŸ‰ [Chipmunk (â­2.3k)](https://github.com/slembcke/Chipmunk2D) - Fast, lightweight 2D game physics library. \[[Docs](https://chipmunk-physics.net/documentation.php)]

    *   ğŸ‰ [msdfgen (â­4.3k)](https://github.com/Chlumsky/msdfgen) - Multi-channel signed distance field generator.
    *   ğŸ’° [Slug](http://sluglibrary.com) - High-quality, resolution-independent text and vector graphics for 3D apps.
*   C++: File Formats

    *   ğŸ‰ [TinyOBJLoader (â­3.6k)](https://github.com/tinyobjloader/tinyobjloader) - Tiny but powerful single-file wavefront obj loader.

### Libraries / C#
